data.introduce: 本接口用于查询余额，显示可用余额和冻结余额功能。
data.business: 该接口用于查询余额，显示可用余额和冻结余额，并可实现保险和票证查询等功能。对应黑屏指令IPAY。
data.functions: IPAY指令是一个自由文本，可以实现多种业务场景，常用的有账户余额查询、保险和票证查询等功能。
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"TES_AirIpayRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"付款方式组输入请求","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Point Of Sale","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"请求者信息","children":[{"name":"@PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Office号","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"AirIpayInfo","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"Commands","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"指令：如：IPAY，值不可为空","children":[]},{"name":"EditableText","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"自由文本：值可为空，当值为空时该指令为账户余额查询指令。值不为空时代表不同的业务，如出保业务报文示例：“FBX/OZAX30/CSHUANGHE1231/RKY6RCD/P1”","children":[]},{"name":"SignContent","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"报文签名内容，可为空","children":[]}]}]}]
